entry.title: Add more information on OCTOKIT_ACCESS_TOKEN to README.md (#261)
entry.content:
Add more information on OCTOKIT_ACCESS_TOKEN to README.md (#261)

This tool can send a relatively large number of API requests. If not authenticated, the tool may not be able to complete even a single run. Add information about why this happens, and give the user information about how to generate the token.

entry.title: changed git-purge-path to git-purge-files in help (#290)
entry.content: changed git-purge-path to git-purge-files in help (#290)

entry.title: Update commit-current-user-check.sh (#293)
entry.content:
Update commit-current-user-check.sh (#293)

Adding '$' to the GHE_URL variable at line 28 so it prints out full path.
